Customize Configurations

To create workflows that are optimized for your users, choose cards, their actions, and their placement, and add other customizations.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Setup for Mobile Offline available in: Lightning Experience


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To use Mobile Offline	Mobile Offline for Salesforce Mobile App Plus
Add an Actions Card
Enable customers to build a place to host their Global Lightning Quick Actions.
Add a Generic List Card
Let users configure lists of objects with up to two subfields.
Add a Timed List Card
Display a list of objects where start and end times are pertinent data.

Easily add or remove components to make customization even quicker.

Quickly change the order that components render on the landing page.
Add an Actions Card

Enable customers to build a place to host their Global Lightning Quick Actions.

Add an Actions Card component to the canvas. Take one of these actions.
Select Actions Card from the Components menu on the left and drag it onto the canvas.
Click the + icon on the canvas and choose the Actions Card option.

On the Properties Pane on the right, you can configure the following:

Card title
Actions to appear in the card
Order of the actions

Add Actions

Click the + Add action button then select the type from the Available Actions dropdown menu.

Add a Generic List Card

Let users configure lists of objects with up to two subfields.

Add a Generic List component to the canvas. Take one of these actions.
Select a Generic List Card from the Components menu on the left and drag it onto the canvas.
Click the + icon on the canvas and choose the Generic List Card option.

On the Properties Pane on the right, you can configure the following:

Card title
Object for which to show records
Order of the list
Number of records to show on the home page (3-10)
Field Properties
Main Field (required)
Subfields (optional, up to two)
Icon Properties
Show (default) or Hide record icons
Swipe Actions

Objects can have swipe actions associated with them if they have subfields that support them. For example, a “Call” swipe action can be associated with the Account Phone field.

Supported actions
Call
Email
Maps
NOTE The subfield for Maps must be a text field that contains the fully mappable address.
Add a Timed List Card

Display a list of objects where start and end times are pertinent data.

Add a Timed List component to the canvas. Take one of these actions.
Select Timed List Card from the Components menu on the left and drag it onto the canvas.
Click the + icon on the canvas and choose the Timed List Card option.

A Timed List card is similar to a Generic List Card and has the same required fields along with two additional fields that can specify the start and end times for an activity.

For example, a Shift object has fields that represent the start and end time for each shift record.

Delete or Duplicate Components

Easily add or remove components to make customization even quicker.

To duplicate or delete a component, use the icons on the card header. Deleting requires confirmation.

Reorder Components

Quickly change the order that components render on the landing page.

Use the four-sided arrow to drag the component above or below other components.
